sentences.en: Deep - bodied sooty - black pelagic spiny - finned fish of North Atlantic and North Pacific, valued for food.
sentences.cn: 北大西洋和北太平洋远洋深水中熏黑色刺状鳍鱼, 珍贵食品.

sentences.en: In some areas even aragonitic shells of the pelagic molluscs pteropods coat the sea floor.
sentences.cn: 在有些地区,甚至深海软体动物翼足类的文石贝壳可铺满海底.

sentences.en: Pelagic sediment contains tiny grain of material.
sentences.cn: 远洋沉积物包含了微细物质颗粒.

sentences.en: Plankton and nekton are pelagic organisms.
sentences.cn: 浮游生物和自游生物都是海面的生物.

sentences.en: The ship is engaged in pelagic fishery.
What is the origin of pelagic oozes?
sentences.cn: 远洋软泥的来源是什么?

sentences.en: What is the range of the pelagic environment?
sentences.cn: 水层环境的范围是什么?

words.tran_cn: 浮游的；[海洋]远洋的，深海的

trans.tran_en: relating to or living in the deep sea, far from shore
